body.name: ELITAPRO Steamer For Clothes - Handheld Clothes Steamer - Easy & Fast Travel Steamer - Portable Mini Ironing Machine - Steam Iron for Clothes - Clothing Steam Iron, Dry Steam, Fabric Brush Included
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 27 mins
features: EASY TO USE STEAMER: No more wrinkled clothes with our simple yet powerful steamer iron for clothes. This 1200 watts steam iron heats up in a few seconds and lets you de-wrinkle your clothes in no time.

COMPACT AND TRAVEL FRIENDLY: This lightweight, portable steamer is ideally designed to easily fit in your suitcase or carry-on luggage without taking up a lot of case. Don’t let creased clothes ruin your trip with our travel steamer.

LARGE TANK: With a 200 ml capacity, this garment steamer provides a continuous 15 minutes steam to get rid of wrinkles and creases flawlessly. Our premium quality clothes steamer is designed to make ironing a hassle-free task for you!

FOR A WIDE RANGE OF FABRICS: This clothing steamer’s penetrating power is suitable for use on fabrics such as wook, linen, cotton, silk, jersey, nylon, etc. Our hand held steamer also includes two different fabric brushes that efficiently remove wrinkles from suits, shirts, dresses, curtains, bedding, and plush toys.
QUALITY GUARANTEED: At ELITAPRO, each product is crafted with exceptional quality to ensure long-lasting satisfaction, providing you with ease and convenience in your every day tasks.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: IT'S THE LITTLE THINGS THAT MAKE LIFE WONDERFUL ! DESIGNERS' CHOICE ElitaPro gives you that Fabulous steam experience you crave. ElitaPro beats any OTHER garment steamer on the market! You’ll Fall In Love With This Home Multi-use, durability, And The Best Portable Steamer For Clothes. THE IDEAL TRAVEL COMPANION Particularly compact design for travel and business trips. One filling enough for a 15 min continue steam Completely safe to use and gentle on all types of fabrics. Don’t Let Annoying Creases And Wrinkles Ruin Your Moments Or Trips. THE PERFECT GIFT! One of the most useful gifts to surprise your loved ones with. Light-weight and easy To Store. Make Your Family And Friends Happy With This Wonderful Iron Steamer. Two brushes are included

UNBE-WRINKLE-ABLE NEW VERSION - STEAMING TECHNOLOGY Relevant Info Don't fill up the water above to the maximum levelNever use the steamer on clothes that you are wearing on yourselfFor better results, use a hanger for your clothes while steamingIn case water is spurting out from the steamer's nozzle while boiling, it might be related to high levels of minerals or impurities. Use distilled or purified water to prevent this ElitaPro dimensions: 9" x 7" x 5" (in) Weight: 1.1 lbs Power information: AC 110V / 1-50HZ / Up to 800W

THE PERFECT SIZE FOR TRAVEL AND BUSINESS TRIPS! New Nozzle Design Delivers A Dry Yet Powerful Steaming Experience, vertically Ironing, 800W, 200ml capacity. Impeccably Ironed And Wrinkle-Free Clothes Right Away. Powerful Smoothing Steam Flow.
THE DESIGNERS CHOSE ELITAPRO No Wrinkle Is Too Tough For The Power of Steam!
THE PERFECT GIFT FOR ANY OCCASION! The gift that everybody in this world definitely needs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Much easier than an iron. Wrinkles just fall out of clothes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good but cheap
reviews.reviewText: This product is honestly good and does it’s job. And for the price you can’t go wrong. The only issue is that it stopped working after 5 Months. The button got stuck at first and then a month later the whole device stopped working in general. Disappointed that happened but still cheaper than purchasing a big steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broke after 7 short months of infrequent use (used 2x monthly).
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It won’t turn on all of a sudden. The button is broken as you can see in the video. I don’t recommend buying unless you want to take a risk, and don’t mind replacing it after a few months.I don’t have a way to contact the seller. Can the seller please write me directly?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not very strong
reviews.reviewText: This does do the job but it took me quite some time and I had to refill it twice. It is only 800w and I didn’t really think it would matter. I am going to be moving soon so for now it will work until I get my new washer and dryer but I would return if I had to use it longer than a month. The steam kinda seems like it barely comes out and oddly it seems to release more steam and gets hotter towards the end when the water is running out. I attached a before and after. Like it said it does work, just not very powerful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I used it to remove wallpaper!
reviews.reviewText: I used the steamer to remove wallpaper and it worked really well. If you put too much water in, it will boil over, but since I was working in the bathroom, I just put it in the sink. It worked great and was very inexpensive for my purposes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: Works perfect easy to use, and light weight!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Poor Quality Steamer
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this steamer to steam the wrinkles out of photography backdrops, and while it did product steam it was also capable of spouting water out of the steam holes, leaving stains on these backdrops that were a pain to steam out a second time. The steamer also gets too hot, and melted some of the attachments that were included. Save your money and pick up something a little higher quality.
